Discord.Description: Sends a message to a Discord server.

Fields.Message-Help: The message to send to the Discord server
Fields.MessageType-Help: The type of message to send.  Basic type will be just the message without a title and no colouring.
Fields.Title: Title
Fields.Title-Help: An optional title to send, if not set the message type will be the title.

DiscordNodes.Label: Discord
DiscordNodes.Description:
A plugin that allows you to send messages to a Discord server.

The Webhook Id and token can be obtained from the webhook URL
 https://discord.com/api/webhooks/[webhookid]/[webhooktoken]
